title: Intel Optane Memory - Powerful or Pointless?
description: Looking to speed up your hard drives on the cheap? Intel offers a solution with Optane Memory modules We will do a optane vs ssd benchmarks and find out!   Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Corsair Force LE 120GB SSD -  Intel Optane Memory 32GB -  Intel Optane Memory 16GB -   Review unit provided free of charge by Intel. This video is sponsored by Cooler Master. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no video direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  ------------------------------------------------------- Sam Davies - Cosmos [Silk Music]  Sam Davies - Northern Lights (Original Mix)   #inteloptane #inteloptanememory #hardwarecanucks
